text: 2.34: Ais 8.14; Hos 14.9; Mt 21.42; FG 28.22; Ro 9.32-33; 1 Ko 1.23; 1 Pi 2.7-8Maria gum Zosep ne mbararagiap ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrve ga mbuim, Simeon mbaram ŋgɨrkama vhuun mbe muuŋgiap, khaŋ mba tara niamuuŋ Maria ga nzuai, “Ndu mbarara, kha tar, ana zumgum Isreriŋ gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrver muuŋrim, mbe ana khɨgɨ rɨrga. Ana vhɨra taagip Isreriŋ gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve muuŋrim, mbe taagip khavɨ thivɨrga. Mbe vhɨra ana ganɨnga, ana Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvir mbe khɨvɨrga. Mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve mbe ne suaŋv buni mbatɨgir ana suanga.
